entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Medicine Hat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:22 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 08:07 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or freezing rain ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 07:25 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 07:25 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Light snow beginning late in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 07:25 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
